title: Regarding the repercussions of the 14-days ban
body: Hello,so right off the bat,I know I'm in the wrong,and as a whole,a very toxic player.But,not fret about it because I will definetely be a reformed player , and even though this will come mostly through muting everyone ASAP and won't have any projection on my life ( just a game folks), it will definetely affect my in-game behaviour,in a positive way. I am just wondering,what comes after the 14-days ban? Do I get rewards(chest/keys) immediately after? Am I on Riot's radar? And if so,for how long? Will saying even the most insignifiant word (e.g. "stupid play") get me permanently banned? Thanks for taking the time to read and reply,and I hope I can join you soon,elitists and diplomats of this game!

replies.body:
>what comes after the 14-days ban? 


it comes  perma ban , meaning  u will never  play on that acc ever again .

The next few steps are simple.

You get

* Reset to honor level 0, causing you to no longer get chest and keys, you need to level back to honor level 2 to be eligible again(at least that is what I heard).
* Placed on the about to permaban list, causing your next ban to be a permaban(this stays until you have played enough games proving you are no longer toxic, from my sources it can take up to 500 neutral games to get back on Riot's not direct permaban list)
* You are also no longer eligible for end of season rewards.

Also,I think I am eligible for the end of the season rewards. I think I had to be banned AFTER 22th of August in order for that to be true,but I might be wrong. All in all,that's just another brick in the wall. One that I couldn't care less about~.

I believe that this year you will have to get honor back up to 2 if you'd like to receive season rewards.

Just fyi, since I already saw that you don't particularly care about that. I like sharing information anyway.

This, but keep in mind that even slight toxicity will cause a perma ban. You are on very thin ice right now, the best solution is to make sure you say absolutely nothing that isn't directly and obviously positive or is strategy related.

If you can't do that then use /mute all
Will definetely just mute everyone,every game. Thanks for taking the time to reply you kind souls!

Great,so nothing bad. Though most people are too soft. Anyway,I couldn't care less for some useless "rewards",and I will simply /mute all every game from now on. Couldn't care less about this community*.

*The majority of it. I'm happy there are people like the ones I met on this tread. You make me feel proud and silly at the same time. Proud that I share the same platform with you guys,and silly because I could be somewhere else,somewhere where people like you guys are seen more often than not.
If you give a troll some attitude or say fa--ot then you could be permanently banned.
